resources.string:
An offline alternative to photo-sphere.appspot 
Photosphere xmp data is added to the image, along with location 
The complete source code can be found at 
https://github.com/gandhar/Spherify 
 
 
Libraries used: 
xmpcore 
http://www.adobe.com/devnet/xmp.html 
Android Support Library 
http://developer.android.com/tools/support-library/
